named-query.name: Address.findByCountry
named-query.query: select a from Address a where a.country = ?1

named-query.name: Address.findByCountryCodes
named-query.query: select a from Address a where a.country.code in (?1)

named-query.name: Product.findInList
named-query.query: select p from Product p where p.productName in (?1)

named-query.name: Supplier.findByName
named-query.query: select s from Supplier s where s.name like ?1

named-query.name: Supplier.updateContactLike
named-query.query: update Supplier s set s.contactPerson = ?1 where s.contactPerson like ?2
